remarks: ` P ` factorial divides the ` N ` -th derivative of ` F ` applied to ` J ` .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
etransclem25.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. NN ) $.
etransclem25.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN0 ) $.

etransclem25.sumc $e |- ( ph -> sum_ j e. ( 0 ... M ) ( C ` j ) = N ) $.
etransclem25.t $e |- T = ( ( ( ! ` N ) / prod_ j e. ( 0 ... M ) ( ! ` ( C ` j ) ) ) x. ( if ( ( P - 1 ) < ( C ` 0 ) , 0 , ( ( ( ! ` ( P - 1 ) ) / ( ! ` ( ( P - 1 ) - ( C ` 0 ) ) ) ) x. ( J ^ ( ( P - 1 ) - ( C ` 0 ) ) ) ) ) x. prod_ j e. ( 1 ... M ) if ( P < ( C ` j ) , 0 , ( ( ( ! ` P ) / ( ! ` ( P - ( C ` j ) ) ) ) x. ( ( J - j ) ^ ( P - ( C ` j ) ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
etransclem25.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( 1 ... M ) ) $.
etransclem25 $p |- ( ph -> ( ! ` P ) || T ) $.
